LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.label: kite shield
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.description: A large wooden shield, with the front decoratively covered by leather. Offers a moderate amount of protection against melee and ranged attacks.
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.tools.0.label: base
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Kite.tools.1.label: centre
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.label: heater shield
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.description: A heavy medium-sized steel shield, with the front decoratively covered by leather. Offers a significant amount of protection against melee and ranged attacks.
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.tools.0.label: base
LanguageData.VFEM_Shield_Heater.tools.1.label: centre
